dungeonadventure.items

Class Lantern

  • java.lang.Object
    • dungeonadventure.items.Item
      • dungeonadventure.items.Lightsource
        • dungeonadventure.items.Lantern
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BatteryEmptyObserver, Holdable, Inspectable, Nameable, Powerable, java.io.Serializable

    public class Lantern
extends Lightsource
implements BatteryEmptyObserver, Holdable
    A lantern. Can be powered ON/OFF. Uses petroleum for power.
    Author:
    Mikko Piuhola
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
